title: Team USA Plays For Gold, Winners And Losers Of NBA Free Agency
description:
Brian Windhorst, Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps discuss Team USA Men’s Basketball beating Australia, the score line being misleading, the upcoming gold medal game, the winners and losers of NBA Free Agency, if Zach LaVine will ever extend with the Bulls and what will happen with the Clippers and Kawhi.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Team USA Advances To The Gold Medal Game, Winners And Losers Of NBA Free Agency
